quote: I didn't answer. Just shook my head and let the tears roll. ""I just want it to go away. I just want all the drama to stop. Nobody would believe me anyway,"" I whispered. ""Nobody would care.
quote_letters: I DIDNT ANSWER JUST SHOOK MY HEAD AND LET THE TEARS ROLL I JUST WANT IT TO GO AWAY I JUST WANT ALL THE DRAMA TO STOP NOBODY WOULD BELIEVE ME ANYWAY I WHISPERED NOBODY WOULD CARE
